parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among different requests. ClientToken can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not set this parameter, **ClientToken** is set to the value of **RequestId**. The value of **RequestId** for each API request may be different.

parameters.name: EndpointGroupIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the endpoint groups.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the GA instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.

parameters.name: SlsProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the Log Service project.

parameters.name: SlsRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the Log Service project.
